trans-unit.source: Provides configuration options for the workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: 為工作流程設計工具提供組態選項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the annotation is enabled for the Flowchart designer and the StateMachine designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出 Flowchart 設計工具和 StateMachine 設計工具是否已啟用註釋。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the annotation is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用註釋，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether auto-connect is enabled for the Flowchart designer and the StateMachine designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出 Flowchart 設計工具和 StateMachine 設計工具是否已啟用自動連接。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if auto-connect is enabled for the Flowchart designer and the StateMachine designer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Flowchart 設計工具和 StateMachine 設計工具啟用自動連接，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 `false`。

trans-unit.source: But when the designer is hosted in Visual Studio, the value is set to `true` automatically.
trans-unit.target: 但當設計工具裝載在 Visual Studio 中，值會設定為`true`自動。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether auto-split is enabled for the Flowchart designer and the StateMachine designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出 Flowchart 設計工具和 StateMachine 設計工具是否已啟用自動分割。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if auto-split is enabled for the Flowchart designer and the StateMachine designer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Flowchart 設計工具和 StateMachine 設計工具啟用自動分割，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 `false`。

trans-unit.source: But when the designer is hosted in Visual Studio, the value is set to `true` automatically.
trans-unit.target: 但當設計工具裝載在 Visual Studio 中，值會設定為`true`自動。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether auto-surround with sequence is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出自動範圍陳述式序列是否已啟用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if auto-surround with sequence is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用自動範圍陳述式序列，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether background validation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用背景驗證。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if background validation is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用背景驗證，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether loading from untrusted source is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出從不受信任的來源載入是否已啟用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if loading from untrusted source is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用從不受信任的來源進行下載，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether multiple items context menu is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已啟用多個項目內容功能表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if multiple items context menu is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用多個項目的內容功能表，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether multiple items drag-and-drop operation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用多重項目拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if multiple items drag-and-drop operation is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用多個項目的拖放作業，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether namespace conversion is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出命名空間轉換是否已啟用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if namespace conversion is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用命名空間轉換，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether pan mode is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出移動瀏覽模式是否已啟用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if pan mode is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用全景模式，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether rubber band selection is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用拖放矩形選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if rubber band selection is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用拖選功能，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the target .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目標 .NET Framework 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the target .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 目標 .NET Framework 的名稱。
